name: Mitsubishi Electric Europe B.V. Brussels Representative Office
goal:
Contribute to the EU policies and legislation in the field of environment (and other domains with impact on business) with a particular focus on:
-energy efficiency
-renewable energies
-ecodesign
-recycling
-global warming
-waste
-chemicals
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
-Ecodesign
-Energy labelling
-Fgas
-RoHS
-REACH
-WEEE
-Circular Economy
-Energy Union
-Heating & Cooling Strategy
-RES
-EED
-EPBD
-Data protection law
